text:
e="preserve">Abba Kyari OON (23 September 1952 – 17 April 2020) was a Nigerian politician. He was Chief of Staff to President Muhammadu Buhari. He was Chief of Staff from 2015 to 2020. Kyari was born in Borno State, Nigeria.
Kyari was diagnosed with COVID-19 on 24 March 2020 in Lagos, Nigeria. He died from the infection on 17 April 2020, aged 67.
